I.name: Umbra Blades
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Nocturne's''' next [[basic attack]] causes him to slash in a circle that deals {{as|120% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to the target and nearby enemies, {{tip|healing}} himself for {{pp|13 to 30}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} per enemy hit. Against {{tip|minions}}, ''Umbra Blade's'' damage and healing are reduced by 50% and it applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects{{bug|2}} to all targets at 100% effectiveness.

The attack can {{tip|critically strike}}, modifying the {{as|physical damage}} dealt to the primary target to{{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|192.5|110}} AD}}.|110% of the {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}} of his basic attacks.}}
Basic attacks {{sti|cdr|reduce}} ''Umbra Blades' '' cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 seconds against {{tip|monsters}} and enemy {{tip|champions}}.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Nocturne's next basic attack causes him to slash in a circle that deals 120% AD physical damage to the target and nearby enemies, healing himself for 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) per enemy hit. Against minions, Umbra Blade's damage and healing are reduced by 50% and it applies on-hit effectsUnknown value: bug / 2 to all targets at 100% effectiveness.
The attack can critically strike, modifying the physical damage dealt to the primary target to
Basic attacks reduce Umbra Blades' cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 seconds against monsters and enemy champions.
I.notes:
* The primary target of the enhanced attack takes {{tip|basic damage}} while the secondary targets of the slash are dealt {{tip|default damage}}. * The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s (only to main target) and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal. ** The critical strike damage of the attack is notably unusual.{{bug|2}} It stems from a time where critical strikes by default did {{as|200% AD}} damage, which meant that 110% of it equaled {{as|220% AD}}, equal to a more standard ''Umbral Blades' ''bonus damage of {{as|20% AD}} added to the critical damage. This also causes bonus critial damage such as {{iis|Infinity Edge}} passive to be 10% stronger on the attack.
Now, the formula reduces the expected critical damage slightly by {{as|{{fd|-2.5}}% AD}}, which is 10% of the reduction in base critical damage from [[Patch (League of Legends)/Season_Eleven#Pre-Season_Eleven|Pre-Season 11]]. * The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s. ** Basic attacks against them will still grant the cooldown reduction. * {{Pending for test}}: ''Umbral Blade's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

Q.name: Duskbringer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nocturne''' casts out a shadow blade in the target direction that leaves a ''Dusk Trail'' in its wake, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit. Enemy {{tip|champions}} hit will leave a ''Dusk Trail'' behind while moving. ''Dusk Trails'' last 5 seconds and will slowly disappear afterwards.
While on the ''Dusk Trail'', '''Nocturne''' is {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus total''' movement speed}}}} and {{as|{{sti|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nocturne casts out a shadow blade in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail in its wake, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy champions hit will leave a Dusk Trail behind while moving. Dusk Trails last 5 seconds and will slowly disappear afterwards.
While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is ghosted and gains bonus total movement speed and bonus attack damage.
Q.notes:
* ''Duskbringer's'' damage is not increased by the {{as|'''bonus''' AD}} gained from its trail, meaning that casting it again while on the trail from the last cast will not result in higher damage.
** It is observed from seasons ago that this is intentionally hard-coded into the ability to avoid the projectile increasing its own damage. This feature is somewhat deprecated as it also limits chain-casting ''Duskbringer''.
* ''Duskbringer's Dusk Trail'' will expose the path of affected units until its duration ends. It is a form of {{tip|obscured vision}}; the trail indirectly reveals the location of enemy units even in the fog of war, including those shrouded by {{tip|stealth}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and also prevents the ''Dusk Trail'' from following the target.
* The formed ''Dusk Trail'' does not disappear if ''Duskbringer'' is intercepted by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other sources of movement speed boosts.

effects.str:
• Movement Speed: %
  • Bonus AD:

W.name: Shroud of Darkness
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nocturne''' gains a {{tip|spell shield}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. If it blocks an ability, ''Shroud of Darkness' '' {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} is doubled for 5 seconds.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Nocturne gains bonus attack speed.
Active: Nocturne gains a spell shield for 1.5 seconds. If it blocks an ability, Shroud of Darkness' bonus attack speed is doubled for 5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|30 to 50}}%|Enhanced Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|30*2 to 50*2}}%}}
W.notes: * If ''Shroud of Darkness'' is active when '''Nocturne''' re-casts ''{{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}}'' to dash to a target, its duration is refreshed every {{fd|0.25 seconds}} during the dash.

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Enhanced Bonus Attack Speed: %

E.name: Unspeakable Horror
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Nocturne''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|90% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} while moving towards {{tip|fear|feared}} targets within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 1000 units.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Nocturne''' torments the target, forming a {{tip|tether}} between himself and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes {{as|magic damage}} over the duration.
If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is {{tip|fear|feared}} for a duration while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90%.
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Nocturne gains 90% bonus movement speed while moving towards feared targets within cr 1000 units.
Active: Nocturne torments the target, forming a tether between himself and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes magic damage over the duration.
If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is feared for a duration while being slowed by 90%.
E.notes:
* Feared enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 180° total angle within '''Nocturne's''' facing direction will trigger ''Unspeakable Horror's'' passive.
** The movement speed buff is granted even while '''Nocturne''' is standing still.
** '''Nocturne''' does not need to have sight of fleeing targets to gain movement speed towards them.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the tether's application but not the damage and aftereffects of one already applied.

R.name: Paranoia
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nocturne''' terrorizes all enemy champions, {{tip|nearsight|nearsighting}} them for 6 seconds. He can recast ''Paranoia'' for the same duration after {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Nocturne''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} to the target enemy champion, dealing  {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival.
'''Nocturne''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] during the dash.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nocturne terrorizes all enemy champions, nearsighting them for 6 seconds. He can recast Paranoia for the same duration after 0.25 seconds.
Recast: Nocturne dashes with displacement immunity to the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage upon arrival.
Nocturne can cast any of his champion ability during the dash.
R.notes:
* '''Nocturne''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash to the target's previous location without dealing damage if the target is too far away or moves beyond {{ap|3500|4250|5000}} (based on ''Paranoia's'' rank) units.
* ''Paranoia's'' {{tip|nearsight}} will apply to enemy champions that are {{tip|untargetable}} or are dead, and will persist through {{tip|death}}.
* '''Nocturne''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]], [[summoner spell|summoner spells]] (excluding {{si|Hexflash}}), or [[active ability items|item actives]] during flight.
** Using a {{tip|dash}} or {{tip|blink}} ability will interrupt the flight.
* ''Paranoia'' cannot be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* ''Paranoia's'' {{tip|nearsight}} does not apply to {{tip|clone|clones}}.
* [[summoner|Players']] screens will turn a different color when ''Paranoia'' is cast, based on their perspective: blue for allies and red for enemies.
* A [[spell indicator]] telegraphed to '''Nocturne''' and his allies will be placed on all enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} within range of ''Paranoia's'' recast while the ability is active. ''The following images display the indicator for the default [[skin]]:''
[[File:Nocturne_Original_Paranoia_Indicator_Red.png|thumb|left|A glowing '''{{color|#8b0000|red silhouette}}''' of '''Nocturne's''' blades indicates an enemy champion can be targeted by ''Paranoia's'' recast.]]
[[File:Nocturne Original Paranoia Indicator.png|thumb|left|A glowing '''{{color|#32CD32|green silhouette}}''' of '''Nocturne's''' blades signifies an enemy champion has been targeted by ''Paranoia's'' recast.]]
